title: 3D Virtual Reality-Based Chemistry Learning Achievement Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Visualizing chemistry concepts through smartphone-based 3D desktop virtual reality, focusing on improving learning outcomes via enhanced spatial perception and self-efficacy.

learning_goals: Accurately identify and explain chemical molecular structures in a 3D virtual reality environment.
Recreate chemical reaction processes through simulation by utilizing spatial perception skills.
Achieve a performance accuracy of over 80% in solving chemistry problems based on self-efficacy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
